TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IButtonControl

summary.span: 允许控件用作窗体上的按钮。

span.span: Allows a control to act like a button on a form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其中可能会实现此接口的一个示例是默认值和取消按钮处理。An example of where this interface might be implemented is default and cancel button processing. 为窗体，就像将关闭对话框中输入未经处理的 ENTER 键时，默认按钮都会收到通知。Default buttons are notified when an unprocessed ENTER key is entered for a form, just like a dialog box would be closed. 同样，取消按钮，只要未处理的 ESC 键输入窗体上更像将解除对话框中会收到通知。Similarly, cancel buttons are notified whenever an unprocessed ESC key is entered on a form, much like a dialog box would be dismissed. ## Examples 下面的示例继承自类并实现接口。The following example inherits from the class and implements the interface. 实现添加到属性和和方法。Implementation is added to the property and the and methods. [!code-cpp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CPP/mybutton.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CS/mybutton.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/VB/mybutton.vb#1)]

para.span: 充当按钮控件的类中实现此接口。

span.span: Implement this interface in classes that act as button controls.

para.span: 此接口的成员将提供基本按钮的功能，如提供到父窗体或能够执行事件或作为窗体的默认按钮。

span.span: The members of this interface will provide basic button functionality, such as providing a to the parent form or the ability to perform a event, or acting as the default button of a form.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult DialogResult { System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置单击按钮时返回给父窗体的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value returned to the parent form when the button is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当窗体显示为对话框框中使用方法和一个其按钮单击后，该按钮的值分配给窗体的属性。When a form is shown as a dialog box using the method and one of its buttons is clicked, the button's value is assigned to the form's property. ## Examples 下面的示例继承自类并实现接口。The following example inherits from the class and implements the interface. 实现添加到属性和和方法。Implementation is added to the property and the and methods. [!code-cpp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CPP/mybutton.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CS/mybutton.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/VB/mybutton.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void NotifyDefault(bool value) cil managed

param.name: value
param.span: 如果控件要用作默认按钮，值为 ；反之，值为 。

span.span: if the control should behave as a default button; otherwise .

summary.span: 通知某个控件是默认按钮，以便相应调整其外观和行为。

span.span: Notifies a control that it is the default button so that its appearance and behavior is adjusted accordingly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过父窗体控件设为默认按钮调用此方法。This method is called by a parent form to make a control the default button. 默认按钮被设置为具有特别宽的边框。Default buttons are set to have an extra thick border. ## Examples 下面的示例继承自类并实现接口。The following example inherits from the class and implements the interface. 实现添加到属性和和方法。Implementation is added to the property and the and methods. [!code-cpp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CPP/mybutton.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CS/mybutton.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/VB/mybutton.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PerformClick() cil managed

summary.span: 为该控件生成 事件。

span.span: Generates a event for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法是具有焦点的按钮或默认按钮 （如果没有其他按钮有焦点） 在用户按 ENTER 键时。This method is called for the button that has focus, or for the default button (if no other button has focus) when the user presses the ENTER key. 如果按钮设置为取消按钮，在用户按 ESC 键时，还将调用此方法。This method is also called when the user presses the ESC key if the button is set as the cancel button. ## Examples 下面的示例继承自类并实现接口。The following example inherits from the class and implements the interface. 实现添加到属性和和方法。Implementation is added to the property and the and methods. [!code-cpp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CPP/mybutton.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/CS/mybutton.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IButtonControl Implementation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IButtonControl Implementation/VB/mybutton.vb#1)]
